entry.title: Of Love and War
entry.summary:
Author: DianneRose2016

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,343Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 542

Summary: Set after Eddie is shot, Season 4, episode 14, but we are pretending that Eddie and Ana never dated. When Eddie’s gunshot wound puts him into a coma, Buck discovers that he is the one appointed to raise Christopher. It doesn’t go over well when Eddie’s parents arrive and start to demand to take Christopher back to Texas with them. Buck isn’t going to lay down and take their crap. Eddie didn’t want Christopher with them and Buck was going to make sure they never got any time with Christopher. But as the days turn into weeks and weeks turn into months, Buck is struggling to pay not only his bills, but also Eddie’s at the house. Buck never expected to be a single parent, but he wasn’t going to let Eddie down. He loved the man too much to fail either him or his son. But when Eddie wakes up, how will he feel about all of the changes? And will his own growing feelings for Buck still be there? One second Eddie was standing on the street and the next he was waking up in a hospital bed with a war going on all around him. Unlike before though, he isn’t alone and him and Buck were not going to let his parents win, no matter what.

entry.title: I want to be me (is that not allowed?)
entry.summary:
Author: Tamystardust

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,978Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 633

Summary: “Buck?” Eddie called, worried. He was already half out of his chair when Buck came back to the kitchen.Panic all over his face, he looked between Chris and Eddie. “What’s going on?”“So… just so that we’re on the same page,” Buck whispered, trying to remain collected, but looking at Chris, “you didn’t call your grandparents, right?”“What? No!” Chris replied at the same volume, looking between Buck and Eddie with horror.“What-““Because they’re currently at our front door,” Buck finally said, still a whisper.

entry.title: Inferno
entry.summary:
Author: Calshandtattoos

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,621Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 3

Summary: the heat of the fire was already starting to make you sweat, even through your turnout gear. three other firefighters rushed by running back into the burning warehouse. You heard that there were at least twenty-five people inside, and didn't know how the hell they were going to get them all out in time. Buck threw on his helmet and the rest of his gear and you watched his every move as he ran into the burning building. "Cora!" Your head whipped towards Bobby, who was staring right back at you, he gave you a slight reassuring smile as you grabbed the rest of your gear and threw it on, rushing into the building right behind him.----"Need a little help here." You whipped your head around, not knowing who the hell was speaking or who they were talking to. The voice sounded deep, you could tell it was a man, and it sounded like they were struggling. You stopped as you saw a girl no older than ten being carried by the man in a full black outfit, his eyes covered by a piece of cloth."You have got to be fucking kidding me."
